params.0: If freezing is ignored, spells such as Entangle and Ice Barrage will not prevent their targets from moving. Damage dealt by the spells will be applied normally.
params.1: In single-way combat areas, the PJ timer prevents players from being attacked for 10 secs after they have been attacking someone else.
params.2: If Single Spells is enabled, multi-target attacks (such as chinchompas) will hit only one target, even in multi-way combat areas.
params.3: Should Powered Staves and Wands be able to cast their spells on players? Normally they work only against monsters.
params.4: Should Vesta's Blighted Longsword be permitted in this battle? Normally it works only on specific worlds.
